scripts.build: pnpm --filter @pos/shared-types build && pnpm --filter @pos/config build && pnpm --filter @pos/api-client build && pnpm --filter @pos/utils build && pnpm --filter '@pos/auth-service' build && pnpm --filter '@pos/tenant-service' build && pnpm --filter '@pos/module-access-service' build && pnpm --filter '@pos/pos-service' build
scripts.build:services: pnpm --filter '@pos/auth-service' build && pnpm --filter '@pos/tenant-service' build && pnpm --filter '@pos/module-access-service' build && pnpm --filter '@pos/pos-service' build
scripts.start: start powershell -NoExit -Command "cd services/auth-service; pnpm dev" && start powershell -NoExit -Command "cd services/tenant-service; pnpm dev" && start powershell -NoExit -Command "cd services/module-access-service; pnpm dev" && start powershell -NoExit -Command "cd services/pos-service; pnpm dev" && echo All services starting in separate windows!
scripts.db:migrate: $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:123456789@localhost:5432/pos_auth_db'; cd services/auth-service; pnpm db:migrate; cd ../tenant-service; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:123456789@localhost:5432/pos_tenant_db'; pnpm db:migrate; cd ../module-access-service; $env:DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:123456789@localhost:5432/pos_module_db'; pnpm db:migrate; cd ../..
